languages.text: "Я буду милостив{mf||а} и дам тебе выбор, еретичка. Можешь искупить свои грехи перед Империумом на службе у династии фон Валанциус или погибнуть на месте".

traits.locale_text: "Я буду милостив{mf||а} и дам тебе выбор, еретичка. Можешь искупить свои грехи перед Империум на службе у династии фон Валанциус или погибнуть на месте".

languages.text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."
languages.original_text: "Я буду милостив{mf||а} и дам тебе выбор, еретичка. Можешь искупить свои грехи перед Империумом на службе у династии фон Валанциус или погибнуть на месте".

traits.locale_text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your sins before the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."
"I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your sins before the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."
"I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your sins before the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."
"I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your sins before the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."
"I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."

languages.text: “我愿意以仁慈为怀，异端分子。我给你个选择的机会，你可以为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务，以此向帝国赎罪。或者，你也可以选择死在这里。”
languages.original_text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意以仁慈为怀，异端分子。我给你个选择的机会，你可以为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务，以此向帝国赎罪。或者，你也可以选择死在这里。”

languages.text: «Voy a tener piedad: te voy a dar a elegir, hereje. O aceptas morir aquí mismo o expías tus deplorables crímenes contra el Imperium sirviendo a la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."

traits.locale_text: «Voy a tener piedad: te voy a dar a elegir, hereje. O aceptas morir aquí mismo o expías tus pecados contra el Imperium sirviendo a la casa von Valancius».

languages.text: 「異端者よ、情けをかけて選択させよう。帝国に対するお前の許しがたい罪を、フォン・ヴァランシウス家への奉仕を通じて償うか、それともこの場で死ぬか」
languages.original_text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者よ、情けをかけて選択させよう。帝国に対するお前の許しがたい罪を、フォン・ヴァランシウス家への奉仕を通じて償うか、それともこの場で死ぬか」

languages.text: "Ich werde mich gnädig erweisen und Euch eine Wahl lassen, Ketzerin. Ihr könnt für Eure unseligen Verbrechen am Imperium Buße tun, indem Ihr dem Hause von Valancius dient, oder Ihr könnt jetzt und hier sterben."
languages.original_text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mich gnädig erweisen und Euch eine Wahl lassen, Ketzerin. Ihr könnt für Eure Sünden am Imperium Buße tun, indem Ihr dem Hause von Valancius dient, oder Ihr könnt jetzt und hier sterben."

languages.text: « Je vais faire preuve de miséricorde et vous laisser le choix, hérétique. Vous pouvez racheter vos crimes odieux contre l'Imperium en servant la maison von Valancius, ou mourir ici et maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais faire preuve de miséricorde et vous laissez le choix, hérétique. Vous pouvez racheter vos péchés auprès de l'Imperium en servant la maison von Valancius, ou mourir ici et maintenant. »

languages.text: "Merhamet edip sana bir seçenek sunacağım kâfir. Von Valancius Hanesi'ne hizmet ederek İmparatorluk'a karşı işlediğin içler acısı suçların kefaretini ödeyebilir ya da şuracıkta can verebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "I'll be merciful and give you a choice, heretic. You can atone for your deplorable crimes against the Imperium through your service to House von Valancius, or you can die where you stand."

traits.locale_text: "Merhamet edip sana bir seçenek sunacağım kâfir. Von Valancius Hanesi'ne hizmet ederek İmparatorluk'a karşı işlediğin içler acısı suçların kefaretini ödeyebilir ya da oracıkta göz yumabilirsin."
